DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
A card in Stasis stays there for amount of turns equal to its cost plus #b1. NL When it exits, it is returned to your hand and costs #b0 until played.
Reduce the turn counter of the right-most card in #yStasis by #b1.
Increase the turn counter of the right-most card in #yStasis by #b1.
When this card's #yStasis turn counter is reduced...
After #b3 turns, a Soulburned enemy loses HP, removing the Soulburn effect.
If this card is #yExhausted, its effects activate.
#yBlock is not removed at the start of your turn.
Dead On cards have a bonus effect when in the middle of your hand.
Infected creatures take damage at the end of their turn. Each turn, Infection is reduced by #b2.
A relic selected randomly between Pear, Whetstone, War Paint, Potion Belt, and Lee's Waffle. There is a very small possibility of Tiny House.
